content.body: littledan: @christianulbrich:matrix.org contacted `White Coat Captioning`, yesterday, which was suggested in the reflector issue and had done tech confs before.  still waiting on response AFAIK, but I can reach out to him to check.  or if we are definitely going with `IR Broadcast Captioning` we can put the brakes on the conversation with `White Coat Captioning`
